Name: Homaysa
About the game: Homaysa is a VR Game/Simulation/Metaverse application that allows users to play, chat & relax, with networked physics making it a suitable place for gaming and simulations all in a multiplayer environment. Features: VR Multiplayer Gaming VR Chat & Relax No Ads No selling of private data No NFTs No Cryptocurrency The current version of Homaysa has only the following features/levels: In Gaming Land: Sword Arena: where users can fight each other with a sword a in multiplayer environment In Chat & Relax Land: Desert at night Space Earth from space
Meta Title: Homaysa: Dec 30, 2022, Alsharefee and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Homaysa? Check out the release date (Dec 30, 2022), developer insights from Alsharefee, and a complete game summary.
